structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 397, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Cumulative percentage increase in revenue from personal property tax by county for 1982-83 only -- Limit -- Tax rate not subject to public hearing and recall.
